description.lang: Aeon Labs Garage Door Controller is a smart and wireless Garage Door Control system, you can control the garage door to open, close, or stop moving via wireless signal on your gateway client or phone application.The Garage Door Controller allows you to configure different alarm sounds to indicate the doors action. Each action alarm sound can be customized. To change or update new alarm sounds for the Garage Door Controller, connect the Garage Door Controller to your PC host with a USB cable and download your sound files to the flash memory (128 MB) of the Garage Door Controller.It can be included and operated in any Z-Wave network with other Z-Wave certified devices from other manufacturers and/or other applications. All non-battery operated nodes within the network will act as repeaters regardless of vendor to increase reliability of the network. It is also a security Z-Wave device and supports the Over The Air (OTA) feature for the products firmware upgrade.

Group 1 is assigned to the Lifeline association group and every device has 5 nodes to associate.When the Garage Door controller is received the commands sent by controller to be turned on or off, the Garage Door controller will send a basic report of its status to the nodes in association group 1. To change what kind of signal is sent to the nodes in group 1, please see the detailed description of configuration parameter 80.
When the Garage Door Controller receives the Basic Set, Switch Binary Set,commands from main controller. it will forward the Basic Set, Switch Binary Set to associated nodes in Group 2.

name.lang: Pair the Sensor with Garage Door Controller

description.lang: This parameter is used to pair the Sensor with Garage Door Controller.Note:1. This procedure should only be used when the complimentary Sensor is missing or inoperable and you have another new Sensor that would be paired with your Garage Door Controller.2. When the pairing is started, the Network LED will blink slowly, at this time, you just need to press the Temper Switch back of the Sensor once. If the Network LED change to be solid, which means the pairing is successful. Otherwise, repeat the steps.
Start the Sensor pairing mode.
This parameter is used to enable/disable Lock all configuration parameters.(0 =disable, 1 = enable)
All configuration parameters are configurable.
All configuration parameters are not configurable (Locked).
This parameter is used to reset product to default factory setting. (There are just 2 values can be used).
Reset all configuration parameters to default setting.
Reset the product to default factory setting and be excluded from the Z-wave network.
This parameter is used to set the default startup ringtone for the Garage Door Controller.
Disable the startup ringtone.
Enable and select a startup ringtone for the Garage Door Controller.

This parameter is used to calibrate the Sensor.Calibration Steps:1. Let the garage door move to full close position. 2. Send this parameter (0x22) with value=1 to Garage Door Controller.3. Let the garage door move to full open position.4. Let the garage door move to full close position after the step 3 is completed.After the step 4 is completed, all calibration steps are complete.
Enable calibration.

name.lang: Set the timeout of Sensor calibration.

description.lang: This parameter is used to set the timeout of Sensor calibration in parameter 34.The unit is second.
Set the timeout of calibration

name.lang: Get the number of alarm music.

description.lang: This parameter is used to get the the number of alarm music that are stored in the flash memory card.Note: this parameter only will use the configure get command to get the number of alarm music.
Get the number of alarm music.

name.lang: Configure the alarm mode when the garage door is opening.

description.lang: This parameter is used to set an alarm mode when the garage door is opening..
Configure the flash frequency of the alarm LED, there are 10 levels can be set.
Disable the alarm mode.
Configure the volume of alarm sound, there are 10 levels can be set.
Select an alarm sound, there are 4 alarm sounds in the flash memory card can be selected.
Enable the alarm mode.

name.lang: Configure the alarm mode when the garage door is closing.

description.lang: This parameter is used to set the alarm mode when the garage door is closing.
Enable the alarm mode.
Configure the flash frequency of the alarm LED, there are 10 levels can be set.
Configure the volume of alarm sound, there are 10 levels can be set.
Disable the alarm mode.
Select an alarm sound, there are 4 alarm sounds in the flash memory card can be selected.

name.lang: Configure the alarm mode when the garage door is in Unknown position.

description.lang: This parameter is used to set the alarm mode when the garage door is in u0022Unknownu0022 position.
Configure the flash frequency of the alarm LED, there are 10 levels can be set.
Configure the volume of alarm sound, there are 10 levels can be set.
Disable the alarm mode.
Enable the alarm mode.
Select an alarm sound, there are 4 alarm sounds in the flash memory card can be selected.

name.lang: Configure the alarm mode when the garage door is in closed position.

description.lang: This parameter is used to set the alarm mode when the garage door is in closed position.
Enable the alarm mode.
Configure the flash frequency of the alarm LED, there are 10 levels can be set.
Select an alarm sound, there are 4 alarm sounds in the flash memory card can be selected.
Configure the volume of alarm sound, there are 10 levels can be set.
Disable the alarm mode.

name.lang: Configuration report for the tamper switch State

description.lang: This parameter is used to report the state when the Sensor is installed on the garage door or removed from the garage door.Note:The state would be reported via configuration report CC.
The Sensor is installed on the garage door.
The Sensor is removed from the garage door.

name.lang: Configuration report for the battery state of Sensor

description.lang: This parameter is used to report the battery state of Sensor. Note:The state would be reported via configuration report CC.
Battery is in low battery state.
Battery is in normal state.

name.lang: Start playing or Stop playing the ringtone.

description.lang: This parameter is used to audition or test the product's ringtone.
Stop playing the ringtone.
Start playing the ringtone that you select.

name.lang: Test the volume of the current ringtone

description.lang: This parameter is used to audition or test the product's ringtone volume.
There are 10 volume levelscan be set for testing.
This parameter is used to get the temperature where near to your Garage Door Controller.
The available temperature range is 0 to 50 Celsius

name.lang: Define the function of Button- and Button+.

description.lang: This parameter is used to define the function of Button- and Button+.

Pressing it once, the Button+ and Button- are defined to be the control item of Next and Previous. Press and hold it, the Button+ and Button- are defined to be used to increase and decrease the volume.

Pressing it once, the Button+ and Button- are defined to be used to increase and decrease the volume. Press and hold it, the Button+ and Button- are defined to be the control item of Next and Previous.

name.lang: Enable/Disable to send notifications to associated devices to associated devices.

description.lang: This parameter is used to enable/disable to send notifications to associated devices (in Group 1) when the state of Doorbell Gen5s load is changed. (0=Send nothing, 1=Send hail CC, 2=Send barrier operator report CC).
Send BARRIER OPERATOR Report Command
Send Nothing (Disabled)
Send HAIL Command
